title: I think I clicked on a phishing link
description: I got an email that looked like it was from IT, asking me to log in. I clicked the link and entered my info. Now I’m worried it was fake.

title: Got a login alert from another country
description: I just received an alert that my account was accessed from Russia. I wasn’t online at the time and I’m in Dublin.

title: Antivirus keeps popping up warnings
description: Every time I open Chrome, my antivirus says it blocked a threat. I didn’t install anything recently.

title: My password isn’t being accepted
description: I tried logging in and it says my password is incorrect. I’m sure I typed it right, even tried different keyboards.

title: Someone reset my password without me
description: I just got a password reset email and didn’t request it. Is someone trying to access my account?

title: Received spam from a coworker’s email
description: I got a strange message from a colleague asking me to buy gift cards. I think their email might be compromised.

title: Two-factor authentication isn’t working
description: My authentication code isn’t being accepted when I try to log in. I’ve double-checked the time and app.

title: Accidentally opened a strange attachment
description: I opened a file from someone I don’t know. It was a .zip and now my computer is acting weird.

title: Pop-up says my system is infected
description: I got a big red warning saying my system is infected and to call a number. It won’t go away.

title: BitLocker asking for recovery key
description: After a Windows update, BitLocker is asking me for a recovery key. I don’t know where to find it.

title: Can’t access secure portal with new phone
description: I got a new phone and now I can’t log into the secure company portal. It says I need to reconfigure 2FA.

title: Locked out after failed login attempts
description: I accidentally typed my password wrong too many times and now I’m locked out of my account.

title: Email flagged as external but it’s internal
description: I received an email from a colleague, but it’s flagged as external. Could that mean something’s wrong?

title: My account keeps getting logged out
description: I keep getting signed out of systems randomly. I think someone else might be logged into my account somewhere.

title: Security software won’t update
description: Our endpoint protection says it’s out of date and fails when I try to update it manually.

title: Browser extensions blocked
description: I can’t install the password manager extension anymore. It says the admin blocked it. Was this on purpose?

title: Suspicious process running in background
description: I noticed a weird process in Task Manager using up CPU. It has a random name I’ve never seen before.

title: Files missing from OneDrive
description: Some files I uploaded to OneDrive are gone, and I didn’t delete them. Could this be a breach?

title: USB ports disabled
description: None of my USB drives work anymore. I think it was a recent security policy but I need access to my backup drive.

title: Need to report suspicious phone call
description: Someone called claiming to be from IT and asked me for my password. I hung up but wanted to report it.

title: Unrecognized device in login history
description: I checked my Microsoft account activity and saw a login from an unknown Android device.

title: Locked out of admin tools
description: After a security update, I can’t access my admin console anymore. Says I need elevated permissions.

title: Phishing email got past spam filter
description: I received a phishing email that wasn’t caught by the spam filter. It had a fake invoice attachment.

title: Can't complete security awareness training
description: I tried doing the cybersecurity training but the page won’t load. I’m stuck on the quiz screen.

title: Ransomware alert appeared briefly
description: I saw a popup that mentioned ransomware but it disappeared. I’m not sure if it was real or not.

title: Unusual login times shown in reports
description: Our weekly report shows logins at 3am from my account. I definitely wasn’t online then.

title: Need to reset my MFA device
description: I lost access to my MFA app after resetting my phone. Can I get help setting it up again?

title: My credentials were shared accidentally
description: I accidentally pasted my password into a Teams chat. I’ve changed it already, but wanted to let someone know.

title: Can’t log in after policy update
description: After the last security policy push, I can’t log in. It says I don’t meet the new compliance settings.

title: Suspicious login attempt blocked
description: I got a notification that someone tried to log into my account but was blocked. Just checking in.

title: Laptop flagged for high-risk behavior
description: I got a notice that my laptop was flagged by the security team. Not sure what I did.

title: Popup asking me to disable antivirus
description: I installed some software and it asked me to turn off my antivirus. That seems sketchy so I stopped.

title: Can’t access encrypted folder
description: My encrypted folder says 'access denied'. I haven’t changed anything with my user account.

title: Security alert on Chrome extension
description: Chrome says one of my extensions was removed for violating policies. I didn’t install anything unusual.

title: Compliance scan failed
description: I got a notification that my laptop failed a compliance check. Not sure how to fix it.

title: Requesting whitelist for secure app
description: I’m using a secure file transfer app but it’s being blocked by the firewall. Can it be whitelisted?

title: Email attachments getting stripped
description: Attachments in my outgoing emails are disappearing. Is this a security filter or something else?

title: Can’t share files via Teams anymore
description: Whenever I try to upload a file in Teams, it says blocked by policy. This just started recently.

title: Need exception for security software
description: Our antivirus keeps blocking our test app. We need a temporary exception so we can do QA.

title: Laptop won't boot after full disk encryption
description: I enabled encryption on my laptop and now it won’t boot. Stuck at a recovery screen.

title: Found unapproved software installed
description: I noticed some software on my computer that I never installed. Could it have been pushed remotely?

title: Password expiration caught me off guard
description: My password expired and I wasn’t warned ahead of time. Can I get a reset quickly?

title: Security camera portal won’t load
description: I can’t access the building camera feed from my browser anymore. Is the portal down or blocked?

title: Requesting temporary admin access
description: I need admin rights temporarily to install a device driver for a secure dongle. Can I get approval?

title: Laptop flagged as jailbroken
description: I got a compliance message saying my device is jailbroken, but it’s just a normal Windows laptop.

title: Need to report a lost access badge
description: I lost my company badge that has RFID access. Just wanted to make sure it's disabled for security.

title: Got logged out during critical work
description: Security session timeout logged me out while I was filling a form. Is there a way to extend it?

title: Need to revoke access for ex-employee
description: One of our team members left last Friday. Can we make sure their access is fully removed?

title: I need my keycard to be re authorised
description: my keycard is about to expire and i need access the 4th floor
